summary: SummaryLancôme Rénergie H.P.N. 300-Peptide Cream SPF 25: An anti-aging cream with over 300 different types of Peptides, that reduces the appearance of lower face sagging, wrinkles, & dark spots.
details: DetailsBenefitsRénergie H.P.N. 300-Peptide SPF 25 Anti-Aging Cream combines Over 300 Peptides and Hyaluronic Acid into a highly sensorial formula to reach an exceptional level of efficacy.Peptides are well known for their key role in skin renewal and are among skin's best ally against visible signs of aging.An unprecedented number and variety of peptides have been formulated into this unique cream: the complementary effect of the 300 peptides stimulates faster and enhanced skin renewal.This innovative formula helps improve visible signs of aging, such as: wrinkles, dark spots, & lower face sagging, with clinically significant results as early as two weeks.Committed to Science & Sustainability: This unique combination of peptides in Lancôme's formula is obtained from the protein extracts of three naturally derived sources, using green sciences.Research ResultsClinically Significant Results:Decreased appearance of wrinkles -25% and fine lines -28% *Reduced visibility of dark spots -24%*Skin tone is more even +23%*Improved firmness +35%*Lower face sagging reduced -28%*86% agree skin feels protected from external aggressions***Based on 8-week results in a clinical study of 80 women.**Based on self-assessment results in an 8-week consumer study with 80 womenKey Ingredients300 types of Peptides: Ultra-concentrated and potent, this combination of more than 300 types of natural peptides helps the skin appear renewed by improving firmness, elasticity, and wrinkles.Hyaluronic Acid: Ferment-based and obtained using biotechnology, hyaluronic acid is known to absorb several times its own weight in water, helping to smooth and re-plump the skin. Lancôme's Hyaluronic acid offers enhanced skin penetration and additional benefits on wrinkles and skin roughness.*Ingredient benefits are based on product formula testing, not on the individual ingredients.Item 2612986How To UseFor best results, use this day moisturizer consistently as a part of your morning routine. Apply once a day on the face, neck, and décolleté after cleansing, toning, and using your facial serums. Gently massage into skin using small, upward, circular motions until the cream is fully absorbed.SPF 25 Version: If using as a sunscreen, apply generously 15 minutes before sun exposure and re-apply at least every 2 hours. Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating.IngredientsActive: Avobenzone 3%, Octisalate 5%, Octocrylene 7%, Inactive: Water, Glycerin, Silica, Dimethicone, Isononyl, Isononanoate, Propanediol, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Jojoba Esters, Tocopherol, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Cyclodextrin, Hydrolyzed Lupine Protein, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Extract, Adenosine, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Hydrolyzed Linseed Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Titanium Dioxide, Acacia Decurrens Flower Wax, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Steareth-25 Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Cetyl Alcohol, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Polyglycerin-3, Polyglyceryl-3 Beeswax, Xanthan Gum, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethiconol, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Limonene, Red 33, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For best results, use this day moisturizer consistently as a part of your morning routine. Apply once a day on the face, neck, and décolleté after cleansing, toning, and using your facial serums. Gently massage into skin using small, upward, circular motions until the cream is fully absorbed.SPF 25 Version: If using as a sunscreen, apply generously 15 minutes before sun exposure and re-apply at least every 2 hours. Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating.

reviews.headline: Soft skin
reviews.comments: I would agree with others that the smell is strong but it doesnt last long. The smell goes away fairly quickly. I would use it at night and my skin would be so soft in the morning. I did buy it on sale and if it went on sale again, i would purchase again.

reviews.headline: Expensive disappointment
reviews.comments: This has lasted me forever--because I hate using it. Smells and feels like sunscreen. Some people obviously love it for their skin, but for mine it looks and feels oily and never absorbs. I only use it when I'm out of everything else. It feels like wearing wasted potential.

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer with added protection from the sun!
reviews.comments: I really like this product and that it combines a decent amount of spf (25) to my face without having to add another product. I work in/out doors daily and always try to cover up or stay iut of the sub but having spf on in my daily cream naturally makes it so much easier if i run outside for just a few minutes here and there. It goes on smooth and doesnt feel greasy or heavy feeling like some spf products. After a hard days work i come home and my skin still looks great.

media.headline: Great moisturizing with SPF as an added bonus!
media.caption: Ingredients

media.headline: I would buy this product again
media.caption: The Lancôme Renergie Peptide Cream sunscreen is a luxurious and effective moisturizer with powerful anti-aging benefits. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly and leaves skin feeling hydrated and smooth, while also providing broad-spectrum sun protection. With continued use, the peptide complex helps to visibly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Overall, this cream is a great investment for anyone looking to improve the health and appearance of their skin.

faceoff_positive.comments: It really works I have a very dry skin and this product helps me a lot .
faceoff_positive.headline: Useful cream

faceoff_negative.comments:
When I think of Lancome, I equate it with exquisite beauty products and luxuriousness. I have been loyal to Lancome products because they produce successful results. 
This however is the exception!! The only two things I liked was the fluffy pinkness of the texture and the fragrance. That's it. 
Upon the first use (at night before bed) my face turned red and the very next morning I had a pimple. I felt like a teenager. My face is NOT sensitive and I haven't broken out since puberty. I rested my face with no makeup and Cetaphil cleanser only for three days. I tried it again that morning under my makeup. My face itched and I accidently got some in my eyes and well that's a whole different story! I couldn't even wear eye makeup to work that day because my eyes were so red, irritated and watering constantly. I tried flushing them with water and using eye drops to no avail. 
I finally decided to only wear this to work as I was running late. I'm outside the first 1.5 hours and the rest of my day is inside. My face was sunburned! I couldn't believe it. 
Lancome, I have no idea where your manufacturing takes place and I've heard you also test on animals. Well, this product should've stopped at that very point. How it passed QC and nothing had a reaction is beyond my comprehension. 
I'm so disappointed! Saddened that a brand with products I adore has changed so much. Please take time to speak with your buyers, your chemists, your lab, your customers etc. Great products can still be made without going into outer space (not literally but you know what I mean) for their ingredients. I can justify paying your high prices but ONLY for a product that works. I will stand with you but sometimes less is more. Get back to Lancome basics, those are what attracted me. 
This product needs to go back to R & D. Nice concept, terrible execution.
I gave two stars because I do like the fluffy pink, fragrant texture and I know Lancome can do better.
faceoff_negative.headline: Lancome, this is your biggest miss!
